items.title: TTao, Lord of Strings — AGENT.md (v1)
items.snippet: awesome—here’s a tight, research-backed **AGENT.md** you can drop into any repo. it uses **Polya’s 4 steps** as the backbone, layered with proven ops ideas (UCB/UCT for explore⇄exploit, OODA for reframing, WIP limits via Little’s Law, and D
